item.description:
Let's try dinner again. This time to Barnes KBAF. Short 50 nm hop. New restaurant and cheap fuel.... Why not?
If the wx doesn't work, we'll use Thursday as a back up.
If we leave by about 5, we can enjoy a sunset flight back!

Last night's flight was awesome and seems we'll be doing more. Need a ride? Let's ee who's flying or back-seat-flying? Usually plenty of room.

http://www.airnav.com...
item.how_to_find_us: We should all meet maybe at the runup area or better yet, taxi in front of the terminal and leave together... More fun that way :-)
item.why: Good place to eat and fly to.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner to Barnes? CHANGED TO TUESDAY!
